alert.note: Alert for Fresno-Tulare Foothills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 4:51PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN TULARE AND CENTRAL FRESNO COUNTIES THROUGH 515 PM PDT... At 450 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm just west of Hume Lake moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. Localized heavy rainfall rates could lead to nuisance flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Localized heavy rainfall rates could lead to nuisance flooding. Locations impacted include... Just west of Hume Lake and Squaw Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
